|description    = A simple and lightweight bamboo basket that is durable and suited for the air-drying and storage of tea leaves. '''"Tea Harvest's Stockpiling and Transport"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Tea Harvest's Stockpiling and Transport" is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|time = 14h
|Bamboo Segment = 8
|sort = Bamboo Segment
